scripts.test: npm run test:elm && npm run test:wasm
scripts.test:wasm: elm make src/TestCompiler.elm --output wasm_tests/compiler.js && sed -i '' "s/console.warn\(.*\);/\/*&*\//g" wasm_tests/compiler.js && jest
scripts.build: elm make src/CLI.elm --output bin/compiler.js && sed -i '' "s/console.warn\(.*\);/\/*&*\//g" bin/compiler.js
